description: The Yatna II High combines proven materials and technical materials for a modern version of a classic trekking boot. Made from robust split leather, the shoe features a waterproof Gore-Tex® membrane, a secure-grip vibram® tread outsole with soft-step wedge as well as 2-zone lacing, and is designed for mountain and multi-day hikes as well as for work and everyday wear. Its wide fit and well-designed footbed makes this multi-functional boot very comfortable to wear. Retains its shape and can be resoled thanks to board lasting construction.
name: Mammut Yatna II High GTX - Mens

specs.value: Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
